# subtitle

**Instance Property**

The subtitle displayed in the Siri watch face card.

## Declaration

```swift
var subtitle: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you don’t provide a [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDefaultCardTemplate/subtitle], the text from [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDefaultCardTemplate/title] will wrap to fill two lines.

## Managing Template Information

- **title**: The title displayed in the Siri watch face card.
- **image**: The image displayed in the Siri watch face card.
